description: Submission of details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 4 (Architectural Details) of Plot 12 Reserved Matters Application approval (LPA reference: 17/6662/RMA dated 28 February 2018 (as amended by 20/0362/NMA dated 7 February 2020, 20/1174/NMA dated 4 September 2020, 20/5694/NMA dated 1 April 2021, 21/5981/NMA dated 10 August 2022, 23/2212/NMA dated 4 August 2023 and 23/5028/NMA dated 19 January 2024) falling within Phase 1B (South) sub-phase of the Section 73 outline planning permission for the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme reference F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014. This partial discharge relates only to: Balcony and Terrace doors to flats; Balcony balustrades; Main Entranceways to Flat Cores and Maisonettes; Roof Parapet and overhangs to flats and houses, Roof Plant; Window setbacks; and Locations of all service intakes and meters; and relates to the northern Block (Block 12N) only excluding ground floor retail facades
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
